title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Boil pasta in salted water. 2. Fry guanciale until crisp. 3. Whisk eggs and cheese in a bowl. 4. Toss pasta with guanciale, remove from heat, and quickly stir in egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour. 2. Grill chicken until charred. 3. Simmer tomato puree with spices. 4. Add chicken and cream, then simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Classic Beef Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, and our secret house sauce.
instructions: 1. Season beef and form a patty. 2. Grill for 4 minutes per side. 3. Toast the bun. 4. Assemble with cheese, vegetables, and sauce.
